definition: to make a formal request/formal request/to make a claim (law)
to ask/to invite/please (do sth)/to treat (to a meal etc)/to request

sentences.english: If you expect to enter the university, you should apply now.
sentences.chinese: 要是你指望进入大学，你此刻应该声请。

sentences.english: You may apply in person or by letter.
sentences.chinese: 你可以亲自到场或去信提出声请。

sentences.english: I have already legally immigrated to the U. S. and do not need to apply for an immigrant visa.
sentences.chinese: 我已正当移居美国，不需要声请移平易近签证。

sentences.english: Many of the documents filed were aimed at keeping the organization functioning.
sentences.chinese: 声请的文件多半是著眼于让这个组织继续运作。

definition: to apply to a court for an arrest warrant
Judicial Yuan, the high court under the constitution of Republic of China, then of Taiwan
to speak for sb/to intercede for sb/to lobby illegally
to judge a case/to render a verdict/verdict
(formal) to inform by letter/to submit in writing
